name: A Cat in the Rain
description:
A Cat In The Rain

***

A Twine story in english (with sound!) about a threatening storm, and a furry distraction from your mad dash to reach your home before the rain gets mean.

  • befriend a cat!
  • get soaked (virtually)!

(actually a bite-size project for me to experiment with the Twine format and share a simple example to students interested in interactive storytelling.)

If the sound doesn't play, try reloading the page or unblocking audio streaming from your browser.

Credits (words, code & sound): Raquel de Miranda, 2022
